note: Someone with too many irons in the fire. Network engineer by profession, photographer, 3dPrint designer and operator, some times hermit, gamer and streamer, ham radio operator, grandfather and great uncle. Sometimes I dabble in home automation, light programming and writing (not published.) Curious about many things, and just knowledgeable enough to know that the best way to improve that knowledge base is to share it with others.
